    • Video Denoising

    This is the comparison of the input and output in video denoiosing.
    The pipeline contains pre-process, post-process and a CNN-based deep learning model.
    The pre-process and post-process runs on GPU and the deep learning model runs on NPU.
    The whole pipeline can run in mobile devices (Qualcomm 8th generation and MTK DX1) for a real time (30fps).
    1080p: input (left) and output (right) 4K: input (left) and output (right)
